text: – The Melk is not typical of all monasteries for many reasons. Firstly , it is very grand which most especially later foundations aren’t. Secondly, it was founded in the countryside, whereas in 17th and 18th centuries, a good proportion of foundations were made in Towns. Thirdly, it still owns substantial amount of land , because fourthly it lies in the Austrian Republic, the only European country where grand old monasteries have been in continuous existence, since they were founded nine hundred a thousand even in one case twelve hundred years ago.
